attributes.action: Build A Railway Station at Sedgefield on the East Coast Main Line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lets have stations convenient for us, so we can just drive to a station with a large car park and get on the train without clogging up the town centres.

Especially at Sedgefield  (co Durham).
This is THE PRIME example. Park in Sedgefield, and Ride off to London.
It is not very convenient having to fight your way in and out of Durham or Darlington to catch a train.

It is time now to do a little something for the constituency of Sedgefield, and for environmentally friendly Sustainable Transport, especially using electrified railways.

There is room, near the A1(M)Jc 60 for a station with a very large car park. The nearby A1M has been well engineered with good connecting roads to all parts of co Durham, Hartlepool, Stockton or Middlesborough.

All trains to Newcastle will surely want to call here for many more passengers – to London, Birmingham, Manchester and even some Edinburgh trains etc.

A Freight Terminal should also be built here, as Trucks will have easy access for the whole of Co Durham, There is plenty of room. A very large Car Park and a Bus/Coach terminal as well.
